mention_address: "Santa Barbara Botanic Gardens, Mission Canyon Road, Mission Canyon, Santa Barbara County, California, 93105, United States of America"
attraction_address: "1212 Mission Canyon Rd , Santa Barbara , CA 93105-2199"
attraction_reviewComments: It is very nice. It is not as grand as the more well known gardens, but it has depth and is a nice way to spend a few hours. Enjoyed it!
